content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price for this negotiation. Keeping that in mind, I expect a considerably high amount for this prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I am aware that the location is excellent and the apartment is in good condition. However, I am a student and I have a budget to consider. I propose 800 Euro per month for the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed amount significantly undervalues the property's worth in this desirable location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear you, Mister Schmidt. However, I am willing to pay a higher price if the price is reasonable. I propose 900 Euro per month for the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Considerably improving your offer, Maryam. However, I still think it falls short of my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I will make one more offer. I propose 950 Euro per month for the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I find your latest proposal more agreeable but am still leaning towards a higher figure. Let me consider it further and get back to you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello, Maryam. I've given your proposal some thought and I'm willing to meet in the middle. I propose 1000 Euro per month for the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: After considering your revised offer, I agree to the price of 1000 Euro! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
